title: OpenTelemetry sampler ratio config impossible with yaml configuration
body:
### Describe the bug

I am using the `quarkus-config-yaml` and seems that I am not able to configure the tracer sampler ratio value using smth like:

```
quarkus:
  opentelemetry:
    tracer:
      sampler:
        ratio: 0.01
```

In the [configuration quide](https://quarkus.io/guides/opentelemetry#quarkus-opentelemetry_quarkus.opentelemetry.tracer.sampler) the two properties are mentioned, but it seems that above configuration does not work.

```
quarkus.opentelemetry.tracer.sampler     The sampler to use for tracing.  Valid values are off, on, ratio.  Defaults to on. | string | on
quarkus.opentelemetry.tracer.sampler.ratio | double | Â 
```

I guess `quarkus.opentelemetry.tracer.sampler` should have a string value `ratio` and `quarkus.opentelemetry.tracer.sampler.ratio ` the double value, but that's impossible with yaml.

### Expected behavior

Samples at the given ratio.

### Actual behavior

Samples everything.
